reviews.review: Best marvel movie of all time. Great story, great characters, great acting, great effects. Simply a great movie. Going to see it again tomorrow
Great job of blending the plethora of super heroes into a cohesive universe that for the first time, maybe ever, feels like there are actually real stakes.
Just saw it for the second time, loved it even more!
I was shocked about the ending of this movie even though it will most likely get resolved in Avengers 4 still this is my favorite Marvel movie and one of my favorite films

Avengers Infinity War was a very good example of a Marvel superhero and was action filled throughout from the first 5 minuets to the last five minuets.

With some of Hollywood biggest stars including (Robert Downy Jr, Chris Evans, Etc) playing leading roles

I cannot stress enough how amazing this movie is. The characters are already situated so you love them all, Josh Brolin brings a performance that wont get recognizes only because it is in a super hero movie but should be given any and every award it applies for, and the story is perfect for the first part of a two-part episode in the Marvel superhero cinematic universe. There is never a dull moment, the soundtrack is fantastic, and the action ranges from brutal to breathtaking. If it sounds like I'm gushing too much about this movie, trust me, its worth it and every other good review it gets.
Exciting!!! ( that half a star is my emptiness after the huge cliffhanger)

What we imagined as children reading comic books has come to life in this epic motion picture, probably better than in any other comic book movie. A genre of movies has reached it's peak and while it will be very hard to top, we still have a year to patiently wait to see where this leads... Fun and mature at the same time this movie is true fan service by the ever growing Marvel-Disney studios cooperation. Between this interstellar cast, Josh Brolin shines as the true star of this picture, the Mad Titan: Thanos!
Great movie,  I underestimated  the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Can't  wait for the next movie.
